text: insurance certain mental illnesses pediatric autoimmune neuropsychiatric disorders review and report the commissioner of the insurance department shall review the implementation of the requirement in rsa ii as amended by to provide insurance coverage for pediatric autoimmune neuropsychiatric disorders when treatment including the use of intravenous immunoglobulin therapy is ordered by a physician following such review the commissioner shall issue a report not later than november to the chairpersons of the house and senate standing committees with jurisdiction over insurance matters
